lbl_start_1_dl: Welcome to the ILS-hosted Eco Jackpot.
lbl_start_2_tl: Participate in the Game by Scanning Collection Bags
lbl_start_2_dl: Scan to receive a raffle ticket.
lbl_start_3_dl: Start your entry by collecting and submitting the target material in the collection bag.
lbl_start_4_tl: Check Your Winning on the App
lbl_start_4_dl: Receive prize money and check out various follow-up events on the app.
msg_or_log_in_with_social: Or log in with social media
